column2: see San Francisco.San Francisco del Rincón is a city and municipality in the western part of the state of Guanajuato
column3: Mexico. The city serves as the municipal seat for the municipality of San Francisco del Rincón. The city lies at the extreme northwest corner of the municipality.

column1: The settlement was founded as San Francisco del Tule on January 21
column2: 1607 by a group of families of the Purépecha and Hñähñu (Otomi) ethnicities. It was declared a villa (town) on September 6

column1: The population of the municipality in the 2010 census was 113
column4: 139 lived in the city of San Francisco del Rincón. The municipality has an areal extent of 415.73 km² (160.51 sq mi). The city is the sixth-largest community in the state in population.

column1: The city is home to Atlético San Francisco football club. The Vicente Fox Center of Studies
column2: Library and Museum lies within the municipality.
